mapper.sql: MENU_ID, CODE, NAME, MENU_LEVEL,MENU_TYPE, PARENT_CODE,PARENT_NAME,FUNCTION_ID,ORDER_NUMBER,rownum as ROW_NUM
mapper.select:
select
from SYS_WEB_MENU where ORDER_NUMBER = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and MENU_LEVEL = '1'

select k.* from (select t1.MENU_ID, t1.code, t.role_id, t1.name, t1.parent_code, t1.parent_name, t1.MENU_LEVEL, t1.MENU_TYPE, t1.function_id, t1.order_number from SYS_WEB_MENU_ROLE t left join sys_web_menu t1 on t.menu_id = t1.menu_id) k where MENU_LEVEL = #{menuLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL} order by order_number asc
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_WEB_MENU_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM dual

mapper.update:
update SYS_WEB_MENU
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MENU_LEVEL = #{menuLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MENU_TYPE = #{menuType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PARENT_CODE=#{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_NAME=#{parentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FUNCTION_ID=#{functionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NUMBER = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
where MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SYS_WEB_MENU set CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_LEVEL = #{menuLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MENU_TYPE = #{menuType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PARENT_CODE = #{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_NAME = #{parentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FUNCTION_ID = #{functionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_NUMBER = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql:
select
from SYS_WEB_MENU where 1=1
AND MENU_LEVEL = #{menuLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND PARENT_CODE = #{parentCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL} order by order_number asc

select
from SYS_WEB_MENU where 1=1
AND NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND MENU_LEVEL = #{menuLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL} order by order_number asc
mapper.select: select count(1) from sys_web_menu where MENU_LEVEL = #{menuLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select max(to_number(menu_id))+1 as MAX_ID from SYS_WEB_MENU
select count(1) from sys_web_menu where MENU_LEVEL = #{menuLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select count(1) from sys_web_menu where PARENT_CODE = #{parentCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select nvl(max(order_number),0) as order_number from sys_web_menu where MENU_LEVEL = #{menuLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select nvl(max(order_number),0) as order_number from sys_web_menu where PARENT_CODE = #{parentCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select swm.* from sys_web_menu swm, (select distinct(swmr.menu_id) from sys_web_menu_role swmr , (select sur.user_id,sur.role_id from SYS_USER_ROLE sur where sur.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )b where swmr.role_id =b.role_id) c where c.menu_id=swm.menu_id order by swm.order_number asc
select * from SYS_WEB_MENU t where t.is_default_index=1 and rownum=1

select * from SYS_WEB_MENU t where 1=1
and menu_level = #{menuLevel}
and instr(parent_code, #{parentCode}) > 0
and exists (select 1 from sys_web_menu_role where ROLE_ID in (select ROLE_ID from sys_user_role where USER_ID=#{userId}) and menu_id = t.menu_id)
order by is_default_index desc,order_number asc
